org.treetank.bucket

Class IndirectBucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.bucket.IndirectBucket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBucket, IReferenceBucket

    public final class IndirectBucket
extends Object
implements IReferenceBucket

    IndirectBucket

    Indirect bucket holds a set of references to build a reference tree.

    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz, Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz
